scan_table_check.description: An ATF Test should have a unique name. Two or more tests with the same name may indicate a user mistake. The check controls whether a test in the scanned application has name duplicates inside or outside the application.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF test name is unique
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Rename the duplicate ATF test or delete it. Keep in mind that only one of the duplicate ATF tests may have been added to an ATF Test Suite. So the developer should make sure that all required tests are contained in suites.
scan_table_check.short_description: An ATF test name must be unique
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF test name is unique
